name: escript-antlr4
description: An Escript lexer & parser that provides both visitor and listener patterns to traverse the parse tree.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.precompile: cd .. && ./JavaScript/node_modules/.bin/antlr4ts -o ./JavaScript/out -visitor EscriptLexer.g4 EscriptParser.g4 && cd JavaScript && cp ./out/*.ts ./src/antlr
